broadwick.montecarlo.markovchain.proposal

Class MarkovNormalProposal

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.montecarlo.markovchain.proposal.MarkovNormalProposal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarkovProposalFunction

    public class MarkovNormalProposal
extends Object
implements MarkovProposalFunction
    A proposal class that samples each new parameter in the steps coordinate from a normal distribution.
